sn37.2:4.1: “Mendicants, when a man has five factors he is extremely undesirable to a female.
sn37.2:4.3: He’s not attractive, wealthy, or ethical; he’s idle, and he doesn’t beget children.
sn37.2:4.4: When a man has these five factors he is extremely undesirable to a female.
sn37.2:4.5: When a man has five factors he is extremely desirable to a female.
sn37.2:4.7: He’s attractive, wealthy, and ethical; he’s skillful and tireless, and he begets children.
sn37.2:4.8: When a man has these five factors he is extremely desirable to a female.”
